thread.title: Pippa Middleton splits from longtime boyfriend Nico Jackson
thread.title_full: Pippa Middleton splits from longtime boyfriend Nico Jackson - CBS News

author: Dino-Ray Ramos ET Online
title: Pippa Middleton splits from longtime boyfriend Nico Jackson
text:
One of the most gorgeous couples from across the pond is no more.
Pippa Middleton has officially split from her longtime boyfriend, Nico Jackson.
Watch: Pippa Middleton shows off her super toned bod The 32-year-old socialite and Jackson, 37, called it quits about 2 weeks ago, a source tells ET. The couple dated for three years, with rumors of an engagement circulating in 2013.
27 Photos Splits Breaking up is hard to do, especially when you're in the public eye
The source also reveals that Middleton spent the night at the house of her ex-boyfriend, James Matthews, last week.
This wasn't the only time the Duchess of Cambridge's sister has been seen with Matthews recently. She spent time with him and her parents, Carole and Michael Middleton, in St. Barts at Matthews' family's luxury resort , Eden Roc, in August. Despite their quality time together, the source also says that two are not getting back together.
Photos: The biggest celebrity breakups of 2015 After a break up, Pippa definitely deserves even more beachside rest and relaxation. See how she spent her last bikini-clad vacation in St. Barts in the video below.
